00083 #define pct(a, b) (b ? a * 100 / b : 0)
00084 
00085 static void display_rename_stats(struct seq_file *seq, char *name,
00086                                  struct obd_histogram *hist)
00087 {
00088         unsigned long tot, t, cum = 0;
00089         int i;
00090 
00091         tot = lprocfs_oh_sum(hist);
00092         if (tot > 0)
00093                 seq_printf(seq, "- %-15s\n", name);
00094         /* dir size start from 4K, start i from 10(2^10) here */
00095         for (i = 0; i < OBD_HIST_MAX; i++) {
00096                 t = hist->oh_buckets[i];
00097                 cum += t;
00098                 if (cum == 0)
00099                         continue;
00100 
00101                 if (i < 10)
00102                         seq_printf(seq, "%6s%d%s", " ", 1<< i, "bytes:");
00103                 else if (i < 20)
00104                         seq_printf(seq, "%6s%d%s", " ", 1<<(i-10), "KB:");
00105                 else
00106                         seq_printf(seq, "%6s%d%s", " ", 1<<(i-20), "MB:");
00107 
00108                 seq_printf(seq, " { sample: %3lu, pct: %3lu, cum_pct: %3lu }\n",
00109                            t, pct(t, tot), pct(cum, tot));
00110 
00111                 if (cum == tot)
00112                         break;
00113         }
00114 }
00115 
00116 static void rename_stats_show(struct seq_file *seq,
00117                               struct rename_stats *rename_stats)
00118 {
00119         struct timeval now;
00120 
00121         /* this sampling races with updates */
00122         do_gettimeofday(&now);
00123         seq_printf(seq, "rename_stats:\n");
00124         seq_printf(seq, "- %-15s %lu.%lu\n", "snapshot_time:",
00125                    now.tv_sec, now.tv_usec);
00126 
00127         display_rename_stats(seq, "same_dir",
00128                              &rename_stats->hist[RENAME_SAMEDIR_SIZE]);
00129         display_rename_stats(seq, "crossdir_src",
00130                              &rename_stats->hist[RENAME_CROSSDIR_SRC_SIZE]);
00131         display_rename_stats(seq, "crossdir_tgt",
00132                              &rename_stats->hist[RENAME_CROSSDIR_TGT_SIZE]);
00133 }
00134 
00135 #undef pct
00136 
00137 static int mdt_rename_stats_seq_show(struct seq_file *seq, void *v)
00138 {
00139         struct mdt_device *mdt = seq->private;
00140 
00141         rename_stats_show(seq, &mdt->mdt_rename_stats);
00142 
00143         return 0;
00144 }
00145 
00146 static ssize_t
00147 mdt_rename_stats_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buf,
00148                            size_t len, loff_t *off)
00149 {
00150         struct seq_file *seq = file->private_data;
00151         struct mdt_device *mdt = seq->private;
00152         int i;
00153 
00154         for (i = 0; i < RENAME_LAST; i++)
00155                 lprocfs_oh_clear(&mdt->mdt_rename_stats.hist[i]);
00156 
00157         return len;
00158 }
00159 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(mdt_rename_stats);
00160 
00161 static int lproc_mdt_attach_rename_seqstat(struct mdt_device *mdt)
00162 {
00163         int i;
00164 
00165         for (i = 0; i < RENAME_LAST; i++)
00166                 spin_lock_init(&mdt->mdt_rename_stats.hist[i].oh_lock);
00167 
00168         return lprocfs_obd_seq_create(mdt2obd_dev(mdt), "rename_stats", 0644,
00169                                       &mdt_rename_stats_fops, mdt);
00170 }
00171 
00172 void mdt_rename_counter_tally(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00173                               struct mdt_device *mdt,
00174                               struct ptlrpc_request *req,
00175                               struct mdt_object *src,
00176                               struct mdt_object *tgt)
00177 {
00178         struct md_attr *ma = &info->mti_attr;
00179         struct rename_stats *rstats = &mdt->mdt_rename_stats;
00180         int rc;
00181 
00182         ma->ma_need = MA_INODE;
00183         ma->ma_valid = 0;
00184         rc = mo_attr_get(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(src), ma);
00185         if (rc) {
00186                 CERROR("%s: "DFID" attr_get, rc = %d\n",
00187                        mdt_obd_name(mdt), PFID(mdt_object_fid(src)), rc);
00188                 return;
00189         }
00190 
00191         if (src == tgt) {
00192                 mdt_counter_incr(req, LPROC_MDT_SAMEDIR_RENAME);
00193                 lprocfs_oh_tally_log2(&rstats->hist[RENAME_SAMEDIR_SIZE],
00194                                       (unsigned int)ma->ma_attr.la_size);
00195                 return;
00196         }
00197 
00198         mdt_counter_incr(req, LPROC_MDT_CROSSDIR_RENAME);
00199         lprocfs_oh_tally_log2(&rstats->hist[RENAME_CROSSDIR_SRC_SIZE],
00200                               (unsigned int)ma->ma_attr.la_size);
00201 
00202         ma->ma_need = MA_INODE;
00203         ma->ma_valid = 0;
00204         rc = mo_attr_get(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(tgt), ma);
00205         if (rc) {
00206                 CERROR("%s: "DFID" attr_get, rc = %d\n",
00207                        mdt_obd_name(mdt), PFID(mdt_object_fid(tgt)), rc);
00208                 return;
00209         }
00210 
00211         lprocfs_oh_tally_log2(&rstats->hist[RENAME_CROSSDIR_TGT_SIZE],
00212                               (unsigned int)ma->ma_attr.la_size);
00213 }

00224 static ssize_t
00225 mdt_identity_expire_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00226                               size_t count, loff_t *off)
00227 {
00228         struct seq_file   *m = file->private_data;
00229         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00230         struct mdt_device *mdt = mdt_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00231         int rc;
00232         __s64 val;
00233 
00234         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00235         if (rc)
00236                 return rc;
00237         if (val < 0 || val > INT_MAX)
00238                 return -ERANGE;
00239 
00240         mdt->mdt_identity_cache->uc_entry_expire = val;
00241 
00242         return count;
00243 }
00244 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(mdt_identity_expire);

00278 static int mdt_identity_upcall_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00279 {
00280         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00281         struct mdt_device *mdt = mdt_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00282         struct upcall_cache *hash = mdt->mdt_identity_cache;
00283 
00284         read_lock(&hash->uc_upcall_rwlock);
00285         seq_printf(m, "%s\n", hash->uc_upcall);
00286         read_unlock(&hash->uc_upcall_rwlock);
00287         return 0;
00288 }
00289 
00290 static ssize_t
00291 mdt_identity_upcall_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00292                               size_t count, loff_t *off)
00293 {
00294         struct seq_file         *m = file->private_data;
00295         struct obd_device       *obd = m->private;
00296         struct mdt_device       *mdt = mdt_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00297         struct upcall_cache     *hash = mdt->mdt_identity_cache;
00298         int                      rc;
00299         char                    *kernbuf;
00300 
00301         if (count >= UC_CACHE_UPCALL_MAXPATH) {
00302                 CERROR("%s: identity upcall too long\n", mdt_obd_name(mdt));
00303                 return -EINVAL;
00304         }
00305         OBD_ALLOC(kernbuf, count + 1);
00306         if (kernbuf == NULL)
00307                 GOTO(failed, rc = -ENOMEM);
00308         if (copy_from_user(kernbuf, buffer, count))
00309                 GOTO(failed, rc = -EFAULT);
00310 
00311         /* Remove any extraneous bits from the upcall (e.g. linefeeds) */
00312         write_lock(&hash->uc_upcall_rwlock);
00313         sscanf(kernbuf, "%s", hash->uc_upcall);
00314         write_unlock(&hash->uc_upcall_rwlock);
00315 
00316         if (strcmp(hash->uc_name, mdt_obd_name(mdt)) != 0)
00317                 CWARN("%s: write to upcall name %s\n",
00318                       mdt_obd_name(mdt), hash->uc_upcall);
00319 
00320         if (strcmp(hash->uc_upcall, "NONE") == 0 && mdt->mdt_opts.mo_acl)
00321                 CWARN("%s: disable \"identity_upcall\" with ACL enabled maybe "
00322                       "cause unexpected \"EACCESS\"\n", mdt_obd_name(mdt));
00323 
00324         CDEBUG(D_CONFIG, "%s: identity upcall set to %s\n", mdt_obd_name(mdt),
00325                hash->uc_upcall);
00326         OBD_FREE(kernbuf, count + 1);
00327         RETURN(count);
00328 
00329  failed:
00330         if (kernbuf)
00331                 OBD_FREE(kernbuf, count + 1);
00332         RETURN(rc);
00333 }
00334 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(mdt_identity_upcall);
00335 
00336 static ssize_t
00337 lprocfs_identity_flush_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00338                                  size_t count, void *data)
00339 {
00340         struct seq_file   *m = file->private_data;
00341         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00342         struct mdt_device *mdt = mdt_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00343         int rc;
00344         __s64 uid;
00345 
00346         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &uid);
00347         if (rc)
00348                 return rc;
00349         if (uid < INT_MIN || uid > INT_MAX)
00350                 return -ERANGE;
00351 
00352         mdt_flush_identity(mdt->mdt_identity_cache, uid);
00353         return count;
00354 }
00355 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_WO_TYPE(mdt, identity_flush);
00356 
00357 static ssize_t
00358 lprocfs_identity_info_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00359                                 size_t count, void *data)
00360 {
00361         struct seq_file   *m = file->private_data;
00362         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00363         struct mdt_device *mdt = mdt_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00364         struct identity_downcall_data *param;
00365         int size = sizeof(*param), rc, checked = 0;
00366 
00367 again:
00368         if (count < size) {
00369                 CERROR("%s: invalid data count = %lu, size = %d\n",
00370                        mdt_obd_name(mdt), (unsigned long) count, size);
00371                 return -EINVAL;
00372         }
00373 
00374         OBD_ALLOC(param, size);
00375         if (param == NULL)
00376                 return -ENOMEM;
00377 
00378         if (copy_from_user(param, buffer, size)) {
00379                 CERROR("%s: bad identity data\n", mdt_obd_name(mdt));
00380                 GOTO(out, rc = -EFAULT);
00381         }
00382 
00383         if (checked == 0) {
00384                 checked = 1;
00385                 if (param->idd_magic != IDENTITY_DOWNCALL_MAGIC) {
00386                         CERROR("%s: MDS identity downcall bad params\n",
00387                                mdt_obd_name(mdt));
00388                         GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00389                 }
00390 
00391                 if (param->idd_nperms > N_PERMS_MAX) {
00392                         CERROR("%s: perm count %d more than maximum %d\n",
00393                                mdt_obd_name(mdt), param->idd_nperms,
00394                                N_PERMS_MAX);
00395                         GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00396                 }
00397 
00398                 if (param->idd_ngroups > NGROUPS_MAX) {
00399                         CERROR("%s: group count %d more than maximum %d\n",
00400                                mdt_obd_name(mdt), param->idd_ngroups,
00401                                NGROUPS_MAX);
00402                         GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00403                 }
00404 
00405                 if (param->idd_ngroups) {
00406                         rc = param->idd_ngroups; /* save idd_ngroups */
00407                         OBD_FREE(param, size);
00408                         size = offsetof(struct identity_downcall_data,
00409                                         idd_groups[rc]);
00410                         goto again;
00411                 }
00412         }
00413 
00414         rc = upcall_cache_downcall(mdt->mdt_identity_cache, param->idd_err,
00415                                    param->idd_uid, param);
00416 
00417 out:
00418         if (param != NULL)
00419                 OBD_FREE(param, size);
00420 
00421         return rc ? rc : count;
00422 }
00423 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_WO_TYPE(mdt, identity_info);

00433 
00434 #define BUFLEN (UUID_MAX + 4)
00435 
00436 static ssize_t
00437 lprocfs_mds_evict_client_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buf,
00438                                    size_t count, loff_t *off)
00439 {
00440         struct seq_file   *m = file->private_data;
00441         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00442         struct mdt_device *mdt = mdt_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00443         char *kbuf;
00444         char *tmpbuf;
00445         int rc = 0;
00446 
00447         OBD_ALLOC(kbuf, BUFLEN);
00448         if (kbuf == NULL)
00449                 return -ENOMEM;
00450 
00451         /*
00452          * OBD_ALLOC() will zero kbuf, but we only copy BUFLEN - 1
00453          * bytes into kbuf, to ensure that the string is NUL-terminated.
00454          * UUID_MAX should include a trailing NUL already.
00455          */
00456         if (copy_from_user(kbuf, buf, min_t(unsigned long, BUFLEN - 1, count)))
00457                 GOTO(out, rc = -EFAULT);
00458         tmpbuf = cfs_firststr(kbuf, min_t(unsigned long, BUFLEN - 1, count));
00459 
00460         if (strncmp(tmpbuf, "nid:", 4) != 0) {
00461                 count = lprocfs_evict_client_seq_write(file, buf, count, off);
00462                 goto out;
00463         }
00464 
00465         if (mdt->mdt_opts.mo_evict_tgt_nids) {
00466                 rc = obd_set_info_async(NULL, mdt->mdt_child_exp,
00467                                         sizeof(KEY_EVICT_BY_NID),
00468                                         KEY_EVICT_BY_NID,
00469                                         strlen(tmpbuf + 4) + 1,
00470                                         tmpbuf + 4, NULL);
00471                 if (rc)
00472                         CERROR("Failed to evict nid %s from OSTs: rc %d\n",
00473                                tmpbuf + 4, rc);
00474         }
00475 
00476         /* See the comments in function lprocfs_wr_evict_client()
00477          * in ptlrpc/lproc_ptlrpc.c for details. - jay */
00478         class_incref(obd, __func__, current);
00479         obd_export_evict_by_nid(obd, tmpbuf + 4);
00480         class_decref(obd, __func__, current);
00481 
00482 
00483 out:
00484         OBD_FREE(kbuf, BUFLEN);
00485         return rc < 0 ? rc : count;
00486 }
00487 
00488 #undef BUFLEN

00499 static ssize_t
00500 mdt_evict_tgt_nids_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00501                                size_t count, loff_t *off)
00502 {
00503         struct seq_file   *m = file->private_data;
00504         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00505         struct mdt_device *mdt = mdt_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00506         __s64 val;
00507         int rc;
00508 
00509         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00510         if (rc)
00511                 return rc;
00512         mdt->mdt_opts.mo_evict_tgt_nids = !!val;
00513         return count;
00514 }
00515 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(mdt_evict_tgt_nids);

00526 
00527 static ssize_t
00528 mdt_sec_level_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00529                         size_t count, loff_t *off)
00530 {
00531         struct seq_file   *m = file->private_data;
00532         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00533         struct mdt_device *mdt = mdt_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00534         int rc;
00535         __s64 val;
00536 
00537         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00538         if (rc)
00539                 return rc;
00540 
00541         if (val > LUSTRE_SEC_ALL || val < LUSTRE_SEC_NONE)
00542                 return -EINVAL;
00543 
00544         if (val == LUSTRE_SEC_SPECIFY) {
00545                 CWARN("security level %d will be supported in future.\n",
00546                       LUSTRE_SEC_SPECIFY);
00547                 return -EINVAL;
00548         }
00549 
00550         mdt->mdt_lut.lut_sec_level = val;
00551 
00552         return count;
00553 }
00554 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(mdt_sec_level);

00565 static ssize_t
00566 mdt_cos_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00567                   size_t count, loff_t *off)
00568 {
00569         struct seq_file   *m = file->private_data;
00570         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00571         struct mdt_device *mdt = mdt_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00572         int rc;
00573         __s64 val;
00574 
00575         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00576         if (rc)
00577                 return rc;
00578         if (val < INT_MIN || val > INT_MAX)
00579                 return -ERANGE;
00580 
00581         mdt_enable_cos(mdt, val);
00582         return count;
00583 }

00586 static int mdt_root_squash_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00587 {
00588         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00589         struct mdt_device *mdt = mdt_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00590         struct root_squash_info *squash = &mdt->mdt_squash;
00591 
00592         seq_printf(m, "%u:%u\n", squash->rsi_uid,
00593                    squash->rsi_gid);
00594         return 0;
00595 }
00596 
00597 static ssize_t
00598 mdt_root_squash_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00599                           size_t count, loff_t *off)
00600 {
00601         struct seq_file   *m = file->private_data;
00602         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00603         struct mdt_device *mdt = mdt_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00604         struct root_squash_info *squash = &mdt->mdt_squash;
00605 
00606         return lprocfs_wr_root_squash(buffer, count, squash,
00607                                       mdt_obd_name(mdt));
00608 }
00609 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(mdt_root_squash);
00610 
00611 static int mdt_nosquash_nids_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00612 {
00613         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00614         struct mdt_device *mdt = mdt_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00615         struct root_squash_info *squash = &mdt->mdt_squash;
00616         int len = 0;
00617 
00618         down_read(&squash->rsi_sem);
00619         if (!list_empty(&squash->rsi_nosquash_nids)) {
00620                 len = cfs_print_nidlist(m->buf + m->count, m->size - m->count,
00621                                         &squash->rsi_nosquash_nids);
00622                 m->count += len;
00623                 seq_putc(m, '\n');
00624         } else
00625                 seq_puts(m, "NONE\n");
00626         up_read(&squash->rsi_sem);
00627 
00628         return 0;
00629 }

00639 
00640         return lprocfs_wr_nosquash_nids(buffer, count, squash,
00641                                         mdt_obd_name(mdt));
00642 }

00654 static ssize_t
00655 mdt_enable_remote_dir_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00656                                 size_t count, loff_t *off)
00657 {
00658         struct seq_file   *m = file->private_data;
00659         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00660         struct mdt_device *mdt = mdt_dev(obd->obd_lu_dev);
00661         __s64 val;
00662         int rc;
00663 
00664         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00665         if (rc)
00666                 return rc;
00667 
00668         if (val > 1 || val < 0)
00669                 return -ERANGE;
00670 
00671         mdt->mdt_enable_remote_dir = val;
00672         return count;
00673 }
00674 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(mdt_enable_remote_dir);

00745 mdt_async_commit_count_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,

00755         if (rc)
00756                 return rc;
00757 
00758         if (val < INT_MIN || val > INT_MAX)
00759                 return -ERANGE;

00761         atomic_set(&mdt->mdt_async_commit_count, val);
00762

00880 
00881 static int
00882 lprocfs_mdt_print_open_files(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00883                              struct hlist_node *hnode, void *v)
00884 {
00885         struct obd_export       *exp = cfs_hash_object(hs, hnode);
00886         struct seq_file         *seq = v;
00887 
00888         if (exp->exp_lock_hash != NULL) {
00889                 struct mdt_export_data  *med = &exp->exp_mdt_data;
00890                 struct mdt_file_data    *mfd;
00891 
00892                 spin_lock(&med->med_open_lock);
00893                 list_for_each_entry(mfd, &med->med_open_head, mfd_list) {
00894                         seq_printf(seq, DFID"\n",
00895                                    PFID(mdt_object_fid(mfd->mfd_object)));
00896                 }
00897                 spin_unlock(&med->med_open_lock);
00898         }
00899 
00900         return 0;
00901 }
00902 
00903 static int lprocfs_mdt_open_files_seq_show(struct seq_file *seq, void *v)
00904 {
00905         struct nid_stat *stats = seq->private;
00906         struct obd_device *obd = stats->nid_obd;
00907 
00908         cfs_hash_for_each_key(obd->obd_nid_hash, &stats->nid,
00909                               lprocfs_mdt_print_open_files, seq);
00910 
00911         return 0;
00912 }
00913 
00914 int lprocfs_mdt_open_files_seq_open(struct inode *inode, struct file *file)
00915 {
00916         struct seq_file         *seq;
00917         int                     rc;
00918 
00919         rc = single_open(file, &lprocfs_mdt_open_files_seq_show, NULL);
00920         if (rc != 0)
00921                 return rc;
00922 
00923         seq = file->private_data;
00924         seq->private = PDE_DATA(inode);
00925 
00926         return 0;
00927 }
00928 
00929 void mdt_counter_incr(struct ptlrpc_request *req, int opcode)
00930 {
00931         struct obd_export *exp = req->rq_export;
00932 
00933         if (exp->exp_obd && exp->exp_obd->obd_md_stats)
00934                 lprocfs_counter_incr(exp->exp_obd->obd_md_stats, opcode);
00935         if (exp->exp_nid_stats && exp->exp_nid_stats->nid_stats != NULL)
00936                 lprocfs_counter_incr(exp->exp_nid_stats->nid_stats, opcode);
00937         if (exp->exp_obd && exp->exp_obd->u.obt.obt_jobstats.ojs_hash &&
00938             (exp_connect_flags(exp) & OBD_CONNECT_JOBSTATS))
00939                 lprocfs_job_stats_log(exp->exp_obd,
00940                                       lustre_msg_get_jobid(req->rq_reqmsg),
00941                                       opcode, 1);
00942 }
00943 
00944 void mdt_stats_counter_init(struct lprocfs_stats *stats)
00945 {
00946         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_MDT_OPEN, 0, "open", "reqs");
00947         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_MDT_CLOSE, 0, "close", "reqs");
00948         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_MDT_MKNOD, 0, "mknod", "reqs");
00949         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_MDT_LINK, 0, "link", "reqs");
00950         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_MDT_UNLINK, 0, "unlink", "reqs");
00951         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_MDT_MKDIR, 0, "mkdir", "reqs");
00952         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_MDT_RMDIR, 0, "rmdir", "reqs");
00953         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_MDT_RENAME, 0, "rename", "reqs");
00954         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_MDT_GETATTR, 0, "getattr", "reqs");
00955         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_MDT_SETATTR, 0, "setattr", "reqs");
00956         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_MDT_GETXATTR, 0, "getxattr", "reqs");
00957         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_MDT_SETXATTR, 0, "setxattr", "reqs");
00958         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_MDT_STATFS, 0, "statfs", "reqs");
00959         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_MDT_SYNC, 0, "sync", "reqs");
00960         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_MDT_SAMEDIR_RENAME, 0,
00961                              "samedir_rename", "reqs");
00962         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, LPROC_MDT_CROSSDIR_RENAME, 0,
00963                              "crossdir_rename", "reqs");
00964 }
00965 
00966 int mdt_procfs_init(struct mdt_device *mdt, const char *name)
00967 {
00968         struct obd_device               *obd = mdt2obd_dev(mdt);
00969         int                              rc;
00970         ENTRY;
00971 
00972         LASSERT(name != NULL);
00973 
00974         obd->obd_vars = lprocfs_mdt_obd_vars;
00975         rc = lprocfs_obd_setup(obd);
00976         if (rc) {
00977                 CERROR("%s: cannot create proc entries: rc = %d\n",
00978                        mdt_obd_name(mdt), rc);
00979                 return rc;
00980         }
00981 
00982         rc = hsm_cdt_procfs_init(mdt);
00983         if (rc) {
00984                 CERROR("%s: cannot create hsm proc entries: rc = %d\n",
00985                        mdt_obd_name(mdt), rc);
00986                 return rc;
00987         }
00988 
00989         obd->obd_proc_exports_entry = proc_mkdir("exports",
00990                                                  obd->obd_proc_entry);
00991         if (obd->obd_proc_exports_entry)
00992                 lprocfs_add_simple(obd->obd_proc_exports_entry, "clear",
00993                                    obd, &mdt_nid_stats_clear_fops);
00994         rc = lprocfs_alloc_md_stats(obd, LPROC_MDT_LAST);
00995         if (rc)
00996                 return rc;
00997         mdt_stats_counter_init(obd->obd_md_stats);
00998 
00999         rc = lprocfs_job_stats_init(obd, LPROC_MDT_LAST,
01000                                     mdt_stats_counter_init);
01001 
01002         rc = lproc_mdt_attach_rename_seqstat(mdt);
01003         if (rc)
01004                 CERROR("%s: MDT can not create rename stats rc = %d\n",
01005                        mdt_obd_name(mdt), rc);
01006 
01007         RETURN(rc);
01008 }
01009 
01010 void mdt_procfs_fini(struct mdt_device *mdt)
01011 {
01012         struct obd_device *obd = mdt2obd_dev(mdt);
01013 
01014         if (obd->obd_proc_exports_entry != NULL) {
01015                 lprocfs_remove_proc_entry("clear", obd->obd_proc_exports_entry);
01016                 obd->obd_proc_exports_entry = NULL;
01017         }
01018 
01019         lprocfs_free_per_client_stats(obd);
01020         hsm_cdt_procfs_fini(mdt);
01021         lprocfs_obd_cleanup(obd);
01022         lprocfs_free_md_stats(obd);
01023         lprocfs_free_obd_stats(obd);
01024         lprocfs_job_stats_fini(obd);
01025 }
